mapper.select: SELECT sub.*, to_user.user_nickname AS comment_nickname_to FROM (SELECT co.*, from_user.user_nickname AS comment_nickname_from FROM comment AS co LEFT JOIN user AS from_user ON co.comment_id_from = from_user.user_id WHERE comment_id=#{comment_id}) AS sub LEFT JOIN user AS to_user ON comment_id_to = to_user.user_id

SELECT sub.*, to_user.user_nickname AS comment_nickname_to FROM (SELECT co.*, from_user.user_nickname AS comment_nickname_from FROM comment AS co LEFT JOIN user AS from_user ON co.comment_id_from = from_user.user_id WHERE comment_id_to=#{comment_id_to}) AS sub LEFT JOIN user AS to_user ON comment_id_to = to_user.user_id ORDER BY sub.comment_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(comment_id, comment_id_to, comment_id_from, comment_contents, comment_time, comment_access, comment_status) VALUES(#{comment_id},#{comment_id_to},#{comment_id_from},#{comment_contents},#{comment_time},#{comment_access},#{comment_status})
